name: Night Club Billiard Ball
description:
Welcome to the Night Club Billiard Ball.This game including the features of 8 ball pool, 9 ball pool, billiard master strike, snooker, and so on.

Features:

- Play live with your friends
- Real 3D 8 ball physics with smooth controls of snooker stick
- 3D live snooker room with smooth 8 ball pool table
